answers.answer: Hi,Your feeling of generalized weakness with feeling of tingling or crawling all over skin suggests some generalized sensory disturbance. This can be due Diabetes, Prediabetes or some vitamin deficiency.A thorough neurological check is essential.I think you need to consult a physician and decide regarding further course of action.If symptoms are annoying then you can visit a neurologist at earliest.Hope this helps.Bye.

question: I am a 38 year old female the has recentally started having some troubling symptoms.  Apx. two weeks ago, I started waking in the middle of the night to the feeling of generalized preasure on my legs, then the feelings started moving around like the sensaion of being touched, and sometimes tingeling or crawling skin.  I am also having occasional episodes of feeling extreeme body heat also preceeding these episodes. Durring which I cannot go back to sleep for several hours, as well as the fact that I have the feeling that my limbs are very heavy.  I have also had two times while awake where my limbs felt excessivley heavy, and weak.  Now today all day I have been having tingeling/crawling sensations all over my skin from head to toe, along with heavy limb and heavy head sensation.  Durring this time my TMJ has been painful on my right side, and I am also getting frequent headaches.  No fevers or recent viruses.  But I have been having what felt like episodes of PVC's in the afternoon to evenings (that was diagnosed apx four years ago).  After cutting back on caffiene, those have seemed to lessen almost totally.  I live in an area where good medical care, including specialists, is really dificult to find, and was hoping that you could point me in the direction I should start when it comes to locating the type of physican I should initially consult.  As well as give me some possibilites I should mention to that physician to explore.Thank You for you time and response, Cas
title: Trying to figure out my problem
